backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend for a legal services site, including jurisdiction/status enums, contact form submission types, chatbot Q&A data, and associated CRUD/query logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—replacing the LegalNoticeBanner with a footer disclaimer and adding a legal notice promotional banner on the homepage—to their affected files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference document for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app, including Google Tag Manager and AMP Analytics script tags, with a root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/google2b25be66b928ef08.h: Google Search Console site verification file containing the verification token for thejurists.in.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers full site access and pointing to the sitemap at https://thejurists.in/sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static XML sitemap listing all public URLs for thejurists.in including home, about, services, blog, contact, jurisdiction, and practice area pages with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router app setup registering all routes including jurisdiction pages (Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, MedchalMalkajgiri, Telangana High Court), legacy Cyberabad redirects, and admin/leads routes.
frontend/src/components/BacklinkSubmissi: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Breadcrumbs.tsx: Breadcrumb navigation component that renders a linked trail with chevron separators and injects a JSON-LD BreadcrumbList structured data schema for SEO.
frontend/src/components/ChatbotWidget.ts: A floating chat widget component that renders a toggleable chat panel with message history, typing indicator, quick suggestion buttons, and keyboard-accessible input using the useChatbot hook.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Renders a consultation request card that embeds a Google Form via iframe, with a configurable URL prop defaulting to a hardcoded Google Forms link.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React class-based error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays an alert UI with error details, a retry button, and a home navigation button.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders a list of FAQ items as an accessible accordion component and injects FAQ structured data (JSON-LD) into the page via the StructuredData component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAdminBut: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site-wide footer component displaying brand info, contact details, quick navigation links, and a list of practice area links for The Jurists law firm.
frontend/src/components/GoogleSearchCons: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with logo, desktop navigation including hover-activated dropdowns for Services and Jurisdictions, and a mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a shared Header, Footer, and a flex-column structure using TanStack Router's Outlet.
frontend/src/components/LegalNoticeBanne: A dismissible top banner that displays a Bar Council of India legal disclaimer, persisting the dismissed state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A non-dismissible dialog modal that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/PromotionalGuida: Empty file with no content or exports.
Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/SEOContentIdeasP: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: A headless component that imperatively updates document title, meta description, canonical link, Open Graph, and Twitter Card tags via useEffect for SEO purposes.
frontend/src/components/StructuredData.t: React component that injects JSON-LD structured data scripts into the document head, plus helper functions to generate LocalBusiness, Organization, and LegalService schema objects for The Jurists law firm.
frontend/src/components/TrafficEngagemen: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatbot.ts: Custom hook managing chatbot state and message history, sending user messages to the backend actor via a mutation and appending bot responses or error messages to the conversation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, contact form submissions, admin checks, and blog articles with appropriate caching and invalidation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Playfair Display and Lato fonts, defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and a fadeIn animation utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page for The Jurists law firm featuring SEO metadata, LocalBusiness structured data, a hero section, firm story, practice areas checklist, and core values.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog article fetched by ID, with SEO metadata, structured data, breadcrumbs, and formatted content including category, author, and published date.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog articles with category filter tabs, loading skeletons, and navigation to individual article pages, with SEO head included.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page showing office location, email, availability cards, a contact form, and a location image, with SEO and local business structured data.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleVerificationPag: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Google site verification page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a hero section, practice area cards, and firm highlights, with SEO metadata and local business structured data.
frontend/src/pages/InitializeAdminPage.t: Admin setup page that checks if access control is initialized and allows an authenticated Internet Identity user to initialize it, then redirects to the leads dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/JurisdictionPage.tsx: Reusable jurisdiction-specific landing page that renders court details, highlights, and practice area links for Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, or Medchal Malkajgiri based on a prop.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page that displays, filters, and exports contact form submissions as a table, with status update functionality and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Dynamic detail page for individual legal services (e.g., family law, corporate law), rendering service-specific content, features list, SEO metadata, and breadcrumbs based on URL params.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Grid listing page for all legal service offerings with images, descriptions, and navigation links to individual service detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/TelanganaHighCourtPag: Landing page for the firm's Telangana High Court practice, highlighting writ petitions, appeals, and constitutional matters with SEO metadata, structured data, and links to other jurisdictions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with CSS-variable-based colors, custom serif/sans fonts, border radii, luxury box shadows, and a fade-in animation, plus animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for 'The Jurists' legal/advocate website, including two existing features (condensed legal disclaimer at page bottom and a promotional legal notice banner on the homepage) and their corresponding pending feature requests.
